high_descs: Turn to your left and go to the toilet across from you.
Pick up the white spray bottle on the back of the toilet.
Turn around and go to the sink across from you.
Place the white spray bottle in the right drawer under the sink.
anns.task_desc: Put a spray bottle in the drawer, under the sink.

high_descs: Turn left and walk to the toilet.
Pick up the white spray bottle from the top of the toilet.
Turn around and walk forward to the drawers below the sink.
Put the spray bottle in the bottom left drawer, then close the drawer.
anns.task_desc: Move a spray bottle from the top of a toilet to a drawer.

high_descs: Turn left and head to the white toilet.
Pick up the white spray bottle from the top of the toilet.
Turn around and head to the bathroom sink.
Open the drawer on the sink and place the white spray bottle inside and then close it.
anns.task_desc: To place the white spray bottle in the drawer under the sink.
